name: DALIT VIKAS SAMITI SAH KALYAN PARISHAD
briefDescription: In the last 15 years, DVSSKP has one of the leading organizations in promoting community Based  programmes and in catalyzing changes in the lives of persons live below the poverty line in the State. As our organization recognize we have been working against great odds-Low level of  resources for the programs in  comparison to the needs - the struggle to  retain trained and experienced field and middle level staff in the organization program's- difficulty in making the government services responsive while working at the micro level as isolated- dependency expectations from clients and soon. During the year while sustaining the programs efforts  have also been towards streamlining the systems in the network- the capacity building.
